mapper.select: select count(pno) from housewrite where userid=#{param1} and pno=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into housewrite(no, userid, addr, housePic1, room, bathroom, nowPeople, searchPeople, publicFacility, writedate, enddate, houseState, pno, houseProfile, houseName) values (housematesq.nextval, 'yeonju1231', '서울시 마포구', #{housePic1}, #{room}, #{bathroom}, #{nowPeople}, #{searchPeople}, #{publicFacility}, sysdate, sysdate+7, '모집중', 13, #{houserProfile}, #{houseName} )
